meanings.definition: Exclude from a group or society
meanings.sent1: The new student felt ostracized when no one wanted to sit with them at lunch.
meanings.sent2: She was ostracized by her classmates after a misunderstanding.
meanings.sent3: The ostracized teddy bear in the toy store looked lonely on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: Being ostracized felt like being invisible in a crowded room.
meanings.sent5: The movie scene where the main character is ostracized left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.sent1: The group decided to ostracize the troublemaker to maintain peace.
meanings.sent2: He felt ostracized by his former friends after the argument.
meanings.sent3: The ostracized cat refused to come out from under the bed.
meanings.sent4: Her ostracized presence at the party was noticeable to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of being ostracized lingered long after the incident.
